ygData.subject: RE: A tale of woe.
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a really expensive thought, but has anyone tried using a diamond? Maybe it gets turned to dust in the process.  Its probably off base but with so much
ygData.messageBody:
Just a really expensive thought, but has anyone tried using a diamond?
Maybe it gets turned to dust in the process. Its probably off base but with
so much searching and no finding you have to wonder.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Jordan [mailto:kjordan@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 11:42 AM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] A tale of woe.


From: Ken Jordan <kjordan@...>

I've been looking for the Diamond Dust also... looked everywhere from LGukk
to OOT over to Dagnors Cauldron and up on the Plane of Hate and found
nothing... not even a rumor of it. If anyone finds it, please send it out
to the list. Even rumors we can follow up on. Oh and I checked Sol A also
in the gnome area over there and found nothing.

Darkadvent - Cazic Thule

aka Zindabus - Gnome Warrior

-----Original Message-----
From: webmaster@... [mailto:webmaster@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 2:26 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] A tale of woe.


From: webmaster@...

Although this is my first post to this list, ive been reading em everyday
for the last few weeks.

I too am an aspiring tinkerer (skill 106) and I have successfully made Lungs
and Rebreathers alike.

Well tonight, after a week of work, I took my 4000pp and went to make some
lungs. Out of 10 attempts,
i succeeded on 4 of em. I then attempted to make 4 Rebreathers... Failure
on all four...

Another 4000pp gone and not ONE point of skill advancement. Int is 182, wis
is 100, lvl 50 character.

If any of you have any tips for me, let me know, im very close to just
giving the damn skill up, ive got over
13K pp invested into it and im quite frustrated.

Thanks in advance,

Surastik Shrieker
Lvl 50 Gnome Necromancer
Cazic Thule Server

P.S. Have we just given up on the Diamond dust? I for one am still looking
everywhere that i can and one
thing's for sure, Faeries DON'T drop it. I've killed about 1000 faeries,
maidens, guards, royal guards and the like. not one diamond dust drop/
